name: Urban Llama Farmer
description:
LD49 Jam Submission: Unstable. Title: Urban Llama Farmer

Unstable your llamas from their stable, and put them out to pasture. Space is limited in this downtown llama farm. If a llama gets out of the pen it will run off into the city, never to be seen again.

If you liked the game please give it a rating/review! 

ldj.am/$266254

Controls:

  • Blue llamas are unstable and still moving.
  • Green llamas are stable.
  • Pick up llamas from the stable and Drop them onto the stack!
